attributes.action: Decorate Christmas Tree in Trafalgar Square
attributes.additional_details:
London is a cosmopolitan city and a tourist hub. People  travel from all over the world to visit the iconic monuments and relive the history of this city 
The present tree does not reflect and represent the true liveliness, diversity, harmony and beauty of our society. In it’s present display it depicts an adverse picture of our society to be a depressed and unhappy community
attributes.background: I want the Parliament to decorate Trafalgar Square  Christmas Tree as that is the symbol of our cultural heritage and an integral part of the history and tradition

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

You may want to start a petition to the London Assembly, or write to the Mayor of London.

You can find more information about creating a petition to the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/who-we-are/what-london-assembly-does/petitions
